review_details: We couldn’t have had a better holiday! Nikos and his family were wonderful and couldn’t do enough for you. Everything from the food, drink, the maids cleaning the room virtually daily, the swimming pool which was lovely and kept immaculate and some of the great people we met. The apartments are in a great location and just a short walk to the beach and restaurants and bars. We hope to come back very soon and thank you Nikos for your great hospitality and making our holiday so special, what a lovely man! Look forward to seeing you all again in the future Sarah, Andy, Harry & George.

A trip not to be missed, we had an amazing day out on the boat with our hosts Efi & Dimitri. Fresh fish all cooked whilst you can go for a swim in the crystal waters, then sit back on the boat to eat together with home made wine! Fantastic day out enjoyed by all of us, such great memories to take home for us. Thank you
Friendly staff, lovely food, all round a good restaurant. We visited three times, each time was nice. Recommend the goat,
Amazing food, fantastic staff . If you like food come here . Lovely views of the sea sums up the name of the restaurant.

Beautiful, peaceful and relaxing location, we saw lots of birds or prey, reed warblers and buntings. We all saw a wild hare, butterflies, wading and sea birds, took our two kids aged 9 & 12, if you like a walk and enjoy wild life it's definitely worth a visit.
An unforgetable experience, loved every part of the trip, the boat ride was great fun and seeing the seals was magical, the guides were very informative throughout. Would definitely go again.

Myself, my wife and son hired bikes for 10 days. Excellent service, excellent bikes we would definitely use again, my 10yr old son was over the moon with the bike he had. Thank you George for being so helpful and friendly.
